## Vector2.lerp() method

Linearly interpolates between the current vector and another vector.

**Signature:**

```typescript
lerp(vector2: Vector2, t: number): Vector2;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

[Vector2](./server.vector2.md)


</td><td>

The vector to interpolate to.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

t


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The interpolation factor. A value between 0 and 1.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[Vector2](./server.vector2.md)

The current vector.
